title: How to Make an AMF Cocktail

steps.headline: Fill a chilled glass about halfway with ice cubes.
Measure and add the vodka, rum, tequila, gin, blue curaçao, and sweet and sour mix.
Use a bar spoon to mix the ingredients gently.
Top with the lemon lime soda and enjoy.

tyn: Highball glass, or several shot glasses if splitting the drink up
text: Fill a chilled glass about halfway with ice cubes.  Measure and add the vodka, rum, tequila, gin, blue curaçao, and sweet and sour mix.  Use a bar spoon to mix the ingredients gently.  Top with the lemon lime soda and enjoy.  Finished.
sentences: Fill a chilled glass about halfway with ice cubes.
Measure and add the vodka, rum, tequila, gin, blue curaçao, and sweet and sour mix.
Use a bar spoon to mix the ingredients gently.
Top with the lemon lime soda and enjoy.
